actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that excess annual leave loss by a Federal employee because of an unjustified or unwarranted personnel action shall be restored to such employee in the same manner as if lost because of administrative error.

summary.text: Provides that excess annual leave lost by a Federal employee because of an unjustified or unwarranted personnel action shall be restored to such enployee in the same manner as if lost because of administrative error. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5596)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that excess annual leave loss by a Federal employee because of an unjustified or unwarranted personnel action shall be restored to such employee in the same manner as if lost because of administrative error.
